name: POP_ONE
description:
Please note: the game won't run until itch adds the necessary headers to their web servers (cutting edge, I know *tsk tsk*): https://itch.io/t/1332996/cross-origin-isolation-to-unblock-wasm-sharedarraybuff...

Inspired by Wouter Visser's Gimme Friction.

Please mind the bugs:

  • ball/bullet would sometimes bounce off on a weird angle
  • when hitting a brick, it might double-collide (and subtract 2 points in one go, which I suppose is in the player's favour)

Source code here.
